div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start; max-width: 760px; margin: 0 auto; margin-bottom: 5px;

code.style: width: 100%; white-space: pre; height: 216.5px; font-size: 14px; color: #ffffff; margin-right: 4px; overflow: auto; display: block;

div.code: ⢀⣤⣶⣶⣤⣄⡀ ⢀⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡆ { ⠸⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡟⡟⡗ "1337.みんな" : "Personal domain", ⠙⠏⠯⠛⣉⢲⣧⠟ "ɢɪᴛʜᴜʙ" : "My archives and projects", ⠀⠠⢭⣝⣾⠿⣴⣿⠇ "ɴʟᴏʙʙʏ" : "I draw and chat here" ⠀ ⢐⣺⡿⠁⠀⠈⠉ } ⣚⣿⠃ ⢀⣿⣿⣿⣷⢒⣢⡀
